ComicInfo.Summary:
The Creature Commandos feature in `The Faceless Enemy` set in occupied France.
Second story in this issue,`The Master Infiltrator`,a tale of possession.
----
The Creature Commandos - vs, The faceless Enemy! - 8 pages - writer: J.M DeMatteis, artist: Fred Carrillo, letterer: Esphidy, colorist: Adrienne Roy, editor: Len Wein
Superman - Saves The Weather Satellites! - 1 page Hostess Twinkies ad
